questionText: Course was beneficial for my technical and personal development.
I would call this course as a difficult course.
I would still take this course if it was an elective.
Exams were successful and relevant in testing my understanding of course material.
What is the overall rating of this course?
I would recommend taking this course from this instructor to my friends.
Instructor was effective at presenting the course material.
I would call this instructor as “notu kıt” (low on grades).
I think the instructor has enough knowledge of course material.
It is easy to communicate with the instructor outside the lectures.
What is the overall rating of this instructor?
